com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management

Interface VirtualMachineClassesTypes

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VirtualMachineClasses
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualMachineClassesStub

    public interface VirtualMachineClassesTypes
    The VirtualMachineClasses interface provides management methods for customizable virtual machine classes. A virtual machine class represents a policy and configuration resource which defines a set of attributes to be used in the configuration of a virtual machine instance. This interface was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.ConfigStatus
      ConfigStatus represents the config status of the VM class.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec
      The CreateSpec class contains the specification required to create a VM class object.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.DynamicDirectPathIODevice
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use device changes in VirtualMachineConfigSpec associated with the VM class to add Dynamic DirectPath I/O devices.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.Info
      The Info class contains detailed information about the virtual machine class.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.InstanceStorage
      The InstanceStorage class encapsulates information about storage policy and instance storage volumes.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.InstanceStorageVolume
      The InstanceStorageVolume class contains the specification required to configure instance storage for virtual machines.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.Message
      The Message class contains the information about the object configuration.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec
      The UpdateSpec class contains the specification required to update a VM class object.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.VGPUDevice
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use device changes in VirtualMachineConfigSpec associated with the VM class to add vGPU devices.
      static class  VirtualMachineClassesTypes.VirtualDevices
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use device changes in VirtualMachineConfigSpec associated with the VM class to add vGPU and Dynamic DirectPath I/O virtual devices.
